divs: Sighting Detailsi as coming back to guayaquil from a town callede baF1os in tungutahua i was in the car passing throw the road near lake balbanerawheni looked at the shiny cloudless sky a white cigar shaped object with noother characteristic floating, first l was loking fpr wings to verufy that wasnot a plane and a saw none the i los him from sight 3 secondes in a curve and itwas gone, there were no clouds near the nearseest cloud was barely seen becauseof its location
